Export.Routine:
INARTRECH ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ERRECHEN NETTO UND BRUTTO AUF ANFORDERUNG ; ; Called by: Form INART D15, 16, 17 "Execute On Blur" ; Form INARTMAT D15, 16, 17 "Execute On Blur" ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : YUSER, YFORM (Input) ; %TXT(1) (Output) ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 20-Nov-2008 shobby SR16169: Allow non-numeric UOMs ; 08-Nov-2006 GRF Doco; Quits ; 20.01.2001 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YFELD,YI,YKEY
SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)) ;DATENSATZ ;data record SET YKEY =$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"P",1)) ;DATENSATZ ;data record SET %TXT(1)="" ;IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=0 SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=1 ;STUECK WENN KEINE EINHEIT ;when no unit ;16169 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)="" SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,40)=1 ;STUECK WENN KEINE EINHEIT ;when no unit ;16169 QUIT
; FIXME : We are setting a newed YFELD - no update to WWWDATEN and %TXT(1) is only value returned <GRF>
;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ;RECHNEN GEWICHT ;have faith in wt. SET GEWICHT="" SET YLAENGE = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,15) SET YBREITE = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16) SET YHOEHE = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,17) SET MATERIAL = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,37) ;MATERIAL IF MATERIAL'="" DO . IF +YLAENGE'=0 IF +YBREITE'=0 IF +YHOEHE'=0 DO . . SET SPGEWICHT=$PIECE($GET(^INMATERIAL(YM,MATERIAL,1)),Y,2) . . IF +SPGEWICHT'=0 SET GEWICHT=(YLAENGE/100)*(YBREITE/100)*(YHOEHE/100)*SPGEWICHT ;GEWICHT IN KG/dm2 ;wt. within
SET HGEWICHT=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,172) ;HANDELSGEWICHT IF HGEWICHT'="" DO . IF +YLAENGE'=0 DO . . SET GEWICHT=(YLAENGE/1000)*HGEWICHT ;GEWICHT IN KG/m ;wt. within
IF GEWICHT="" IF $GET(YKEY)'="" SET GEWICHT=$PIECE($GET(^INART(YM,$PIECE(YKEY,",",1),1)),Y,43) IF +$PIECE(GEWICHT,".",2)=0 QUIT $JUSTIFY(GEWICHT,0,0) ;KEINE NACHKOMMA ;no
SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,43)=$JUSTIFY(GEWICHT,0,3) ;GEWICHT ;wt. SET ME=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,40) ;MENGENEINHEIT STUNDE ;time IF ME=2 DO . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,26)=2 ;WENN STUNDEN DANN LEISTUNG ;when procrastinate performance . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)=60*60 ;FERTIGUNGSZEIT . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,43)="" ;gewicht ;weight . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,44)="" ;M3 . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,37)="" ;MATERIAL . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)="" ;DIM
IF ME=10 DO . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,26)=2 ;MINUTEN . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)=60 ;FERTIGUNGSZEIT . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,43)="" ;gewicht ;weight . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,44)="" ;M3 . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,37)="" ;MATERIAL . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)="" ;DIM
IF ME=11 DO . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,26)=2 ;INDUSTRIIMINUTEN . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,45)=60 ;FERTIGUNGSZEIT . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,43)="" ;gewicht ;weight . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,44)="" ;M3 . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,37)="" ;MATERIAL . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)="" ;DIM . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)="" ;DIM
IF ME=4 DO ;KG NUR WENN KEIN AUTOMATISCHES GEWICHT ;only when no wt. . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,43)="1" ;gewicht ;weight
IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,18)=0 DO ;FLÄCHE RECHNEN ;top have faith in . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)=0 ;LÄNGE ;length . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)=0 ;BREITE ;width . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)'=0 ;HÖHE ;height . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,18)=$JUSTIFY(($PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)/1000)*($PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)/1000),0,4)
IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,44)=0 DO ;FLÄCHE RECHNEN ;top have faith in . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)=0 ;LÄNGE ;length . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)=0 ;BREITE ;width . QUIT:+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)=0 ;HÖHE ;height . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,44)=$JUSTIFY(($PIECE(YFELD,Y,15)/1000)*($PIECE(YFELD,Y,16)/1000)*($PIECE(YFELD,Y,17)/1000),0,4)
FOR YI=15,16,17,26,45,37 DO . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,0)
FOR YI=18,44 DO . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,4)
FOR YI=43 DO . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1),Y,YI)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI),0,3)
QUIT ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END
